description: n is divisible by the number of unitary divisors of n (A034444).
formula: Binomial transform of [1, 1, 1, 1, -3, 5, -7, 9, -11, 13,...]. Binomial transform of this sequence = A048481: (1, 3, 9, 27, 77, 207, 529,...). - _Gary W. Adamson_, Oct 23 2007
example: a[ 81 ]=392=2^3*7^2 has 4 unitary divisors: {1,392,8,49} and 4 divides 392.
mathematica: okQ[n_] := Divisible[n, DivisorSum[n, Boole[CoprimeQ[#, n/#]]&]]; Select[ Range[300], okQ] (* _Jean-Fran√ßois Alcover_, Dec 05 2015 *)
prog: (PARI) isok(n) = !(n % sumdiv(n, d, gcd(d, n/d)==1)); \\ _Michel Marcus_, Feb 25 2014
author: _Labos Elemer_
